fields.title: unsupervised pre-training
fields.pointers: * The advantages of unsupervised pre-training relate to the distinction between  [generative and discriminative models](generative_vs_discriminative)
fields.summary: Training deep feed-forward neural networks can be difficult because of local optima in the objective function and because complex models are prone to overfitting. Unsupervised pre-training initializes a discriminative neural net from one which was trained using an unsupervised criterion, such as a deep belief network or a deep autoencoder. This method can sometimes help with both the optimization and the overfitting issues.
